txt.en: Defeated Khîl, leader of Moria's Orcs
You have found out a great deal about the dangers embedded in Zelem-melek, and should bring your full account to Mögr in the Twenty-first Hall.

'Thank you for all of your help, [placeholder]. I believe your account of the Durub Orcs will be enough to convince that fool of a foreman in the Twenty-first Hall that it is too soon to be letting down his guard.\n\n'I hope your news will reinforce Reinn's reports!'
Foreman Mögr is at the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should return to Mögr in the Twenty-first Hall and correct his views of Zelem-melek.

'You again? Welcome back, [placeholder]. Did you have a nice journey in Zelem-melek?'

You explain of the dangerous Orc-camp you encountered, and of Dómárr's harrowing passage. Did Reinn not make it back to deliver this news?

'I -- that is very strange. No, I have not seen Reinn since he left with you.'
Knakk is in the Orc-watch, south-west of the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nKnakk will want to hear how you succesfully interrupted the meeting and defeated Khîl and Ozût.
'The Orcs are routed! It will be some time before they gather their strength again.'
Return to Mögr with a full account of Zelem-melek
Defeat Khîl, leader of Moria's Orcs
Bring the news to Mögr at the Twenty-first Hall
